description: Retrieves the status of a migration operation.

nested_items.name: ImportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the specified catalog migration.

nested_items.name: ImportCompleted
nested_items.description: True if the migration has completed, or False otherwise.

nested_items.name: ImportTime
nested_items.description: The time that the migration was started.

nested_items.name: ImportedBy
nested_items.description: The name of the person who initiated the migration.
